EUROMED meeting in Tampere. Controls mainly at Helsinki-Vantaa, Turku and Tampere- Pirkkala airports and the ports of Helsinki, Hanko and Turku, FI-SE and FI-NO land borders

Informal meeting of Heads of States and Government in Lahti. Controls mainly at Helsinki-Vantaa, Turku and Tampere- Pirkkala airports and the ports of Helsinki, Hanko and Turku, FI-SE and FI-NO land borders

Youth Days of radical young Basques in Saint-Pée-sur-Nivelle and demonstration organised in Bayonne by the support committee of Philippe Bidart. FR-ES land border (border crossing point on the highway A63 in Biriatou, St Jacques bridge, Béhobie bridge, Hendaye station)
